exceptions.exn: The LHS of SF_seq_bij (SF_make (SF_lx _) (SF_ly _) (SF_size_lx_ly _)) does not match any subterm of the goal

original: intros ptd H. unfold pointed_subdiv, sorted, SF_ly in *. intros i Hi. rewrite SF_seq_bij in H. specialize (H i Hi). unfold SF_sorted, sorted in *. induction i as [|i IHi]. - destruct ptd as [h t]. simpl in *. destruct t; auto. - destruct ptd as [h t]. simpl in *. destruct t; auto. simpl in H. destruct t; auto.
